summary: This bill, the Clean Energy Victory Bond Act of 2025, proposes the issuance of Clean Energy Victory Bonds by the Treasury Secretary to fund clean energy projects. These bonds, modeled after WWII Victory Bonds, would be used for projects at the federal, state, and local levels, including energy efficiency upgrades, renewable energy deployment, and infrastructure improvements. The bill mandates that at least 40% of the funds are directed towards projects in disadvantaged communities. The aim is to combat climate change, promote energy security, and stimulate job creation.
